title: London/Holborn-Clerkenwell
name: SOSHO
hours: Tu noon-midnight, W Th noon-01:00, F noon-03:00, Sa 19:00-04:00, Su 21:00-06:00
content: Sosho is a former photographic studio and warehouse space converted into a two floor restaurant, bar, lounge and club with a 24 hour licence, midway between the city and central Shoreditch. Sosho is light and airy during the day time, candle lit and loungey in the evening. Serve carefully sourced and ''proper food'', with world class cocktails and great music on one of East London's best sound system. With a 24 hour licence it is a late night drinking and DJ bar during the week and a cutting edge clubbing venue at the weekend.
